macro.name: IPADDR
macro.description: IP Address - for use ONLY on 500 models

macro.name: PRESA1ON
macro.description: Set to Y if measurement circuit A1 is connected (default:Y)

macro.name: PRESA2ON
macro.description: Set to Y if measurement circuit A2 is connected (default:Y)

macro.name: PRESB1ON
macro.description: Set to Y if measurement circuit B1 is connected (default:Y)

macro.name: PRESB2ON
macro.description: Set to Y if measurement circuit B2 is connected (default:Y)

macro.name: TPG_UNDERRANGE_ALARM_SEVERITY_CHAN1
macro.description: Set to NO_ALARM if not wanting underrange pressure alarms on CHANNEL 1

macro.name: TPG_UNDERRANGE_ALARM_SEVERITY_CHAN2
macro.description: Set to NO_ALARM if not wanting underrange pressure alarms on CHANNEL 2
